description: This Dart source file defines the main entry point of a Flutter application, including the HomeScreen widget that builds a TV interface with animated backgrounds, focus management for D-pad navigation, data loading, and integration of various UI components like HeroBanner and HorizontalRail. It also includes data models and focus handling logic.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model representing the structure of home screen JSON data, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster URL, and recommendations.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget building the main TV interface with focus management, animated background, hero banner, and recommendation carousel.

classes.name: _VignettePainter
classes.description: CustomPainter class rendering vignette overlay effect.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: An intent class used for D-pad directional focus navigation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the TvApp widget.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronously loads home data from local assets or app state’s data source.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus movement based on D-pad input using focusInDirection.

methods.name: _dpadShortcuts
methods.description: Provides shortcut mappings for D-pad arrow keys and selection.
